text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews This guy is the biggest idiot on earth! Many ppl will die because he is not solving the real problem: #CoronavirusPandemic; he doesn’t know how to organize and lead; the economy will tank even more and the entire US economy will be his next bankruptcy. #MAGA idiots!

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
